hints.content: The target color is pure red. To make red we need to increase the red value to maximum while keeping the other values at 0.

Set red to $100\%$.

![Completed exercise, showing red at 100%, green at 0% and blue at 0%](https://ka-perseus-images.s3.amazonaws.com/af47383b663dd3f1adc13864b2c224c5a8d3c09d.png)

question.content:
Use the sliders to change the amount of Red, Green and Blue in the color on the left. When you match the target color click the _Check answer_  button.
